page.title: 12Education in Johnstone
page.content: There are six Primary Schools in Johnstone, three of which are Roman Catholic - St Anthonys, St Davids, and St Margarets. The remaining are all non-denominational - Auchenlodment, Fordbank and Cochrane Castle. The two Secondary Schools are Johnstone High School which is non-denominational and St Cuthberts which is a RC School. The REctor of Johnstone High feels that in the near future upper school pupils will not only be able to sit 'O'Grades and Highers but also modules in the vicinity of the schools. Unlike other schools Johnstone High's roll is likely to decline only slightly from 1525 in 1986 to 1350 in 1990. Apart from the development of the new Standard Grades to replace 'O'Grades the new developments are likely to be Health/Drug Education, Religious Education and Computer Education
